Package com.atlan.cache

Class RoleCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atlan.cache.RoleCache
  • public class RoleCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Lazily-loaded cache for translating Atlan-internal roles into their various IDs.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdForName

        public java.lang.String getIdForName​(java.lang.String name)
                              throws AtlanException
        Translate the provided human-readable role name to its GUID.
        Parameters:
        name - human-readable name of the role
        Returns:
        unique identifier (GUID) of the role
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication problem if the cache needs to be refreshed
        NotFoundException - if the role cannot be found (does not exist) in Atlan
        InvalidRequestException - if no name was provided for the role to retrieve

      • getNameForId

        public java.lang.String getNameForId​(java.lang.String id)
                              throws AtlanException
        Translate the provided role GUID to the human-readable role name.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier (GUID) of the role
        Returns:
        human-readable name of the role
        Throws:
        AtlanException - on any API communication problem if the cache needs to be refreshed
        NotFoundException - if the role cannot be found (does not exist) in Atlan
        InvalidRequestException - if no name was provided for the role to retrieve
